title: for sale: SGC T205's Clarke, Barry, Dickson
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: for sale: SGC T205's Clarke, Barry, Dickson
posts.post_content:
For sale: 3 SGC T205's.  Prices are ppd.  You can respond here or by PM.  Any form of payment is okay.  Thanks.

Bill

T205 Clarke SGC 40 (corner wear, no creases):  $80
T205 Dickson SGC 60 (a bit o/c, but still EX):  $75
T205 Barry SGC 50 (slight corner wear, no creases):  $45
